description.@en: Grand Master Dunklewasser von Artur once famously said, “... when I cross the river Lethe, my last conscious thoughts will be of the order, and the order, and the order.” Nothing is more sacred to a Grand Master than the order they serve, holding it above their own family and blood.

effect.@en: Immediately change your Order Alignment to Pride and your Chaos Alignment to Arrogance.
